meanings.definition: Unable to exist or work together harmoniously
meanings.sent1: The incompatibility colors clashed in the painting.
meanings.sent2: Their incompatibility personalities led to constant arguments.
meanings.sent3: The incompatibility socks refused to stay in the same drawer.
meanings.sent4: The incompatibility puzzle pieces could never fit together.
meanings.sent5: The incompatibility patterns created a chaotic design.

meanings.sent1: The incompatibility between their schedules caused conflicts.
meanings.sent2: The incompatibility of opinions led to a stalemate.
meanings.sent3: The incompatibility of flavors in the dish made it unique.
meanings.sent4: The incompatibility of styles clashed in the art exhibition.
meanings.sent5: The incompatibility in their stories raised suspicions.

meanings.definition: Incapable of being mixed or combined
meanings.sent1: The incompatibility substances repelled each other.
meanings.sent2: The incompatibility materials could not be blended.
meanings.sent3: The incompatibility ingredients refused to blend in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The incompatibility scents clashed in the room.
meanings.sent5: The incompatibility textures created a rough surface.
